_meta.description: Comprehensive audit of review data pipeline against ideal flow

idealFlow.name: Find Shows Needed
idealFlow.description: Identify which shows need review data collection

idealFlow.name: Show Score Extraction
idealFlow.description: Save page, extract review count, date, every review (outlet, author, date, excerpt, URL), audience data

idealFlow.name: DTLI Extraction
idealFlow.description: Save page, extract review count, date, every review with THUMBS (up/flat/down)

idealFlow.name: BWW Roundup Extraction
idealFlow.description: Save page, extract review count, date, every review with THUMBS

idealFlow.name: Combine & Dedupe
idealFlow.description: Merge reviews from all sources into one canonical list, removing duplicates

idealFlow.name: Production Verification
idealFlow.description: Verify correct production (Broadway not off-Broadway, not touring, not West End, not wrong revival)

idealFlow.name: Full Text Retrieval
idealFlow.description: Fetch 90%+ full review texts, capture original scores (4/5 stars), capture designations (Critic's Pick)

idealFlow.name: Content Verification
idealFlow.description: Verify right text, full review, paywall handling, correct production, score conversion correctness

idealFlow.name: LLM Ensemble Scoring
idealFlow.description: Score reviews using LLM ensemble (AFTER all above steps complete)

idealFlow.name: Other Show Data
idealFlow.description: Metadata, images, audience buzz, box office, etc.

gaps.issue: No automated tracking of which shows need review refresh
gaps.notes: check-show-freshness.js exists but runs weekly, not on-demand

gaps.issue: Carousel scrolling doesn't always capture ALL reviews
gaps.notes: Sample: Show Score reports X reviews, we often capture <X

gaps.issue: Audience score extraction exists but not consistently integrated
gaps.notes: JSON-LD extraction works but separate from main review gathering

gaps.issue: Review date extraction is inconsistent
gaps.notes: Date field often null in extracted reviews

gaps.issue: showScoreExcerpt not always populated in review files
gaps.notes: Sample hadestown-2019: many reviews missing showScoreExcerpt

gaps.issue: DTLI thumbs NOT consistently captured for all reviews
gaps.notes: Sample: hadestown-2019 has 72 reviews but only 6 (8.3%) have dtliThumb populated

gaps.issue: extractDTLIReviews HTML parsing may miss reviews
gaps.notes: Regex-based extraction may not handle all HTML variations

gaps.issue: DTLI excerpt often contains multiple critics concatenated
gaps.notes: cleanExcerpt in rebuild-all-reviews.js tries to fix this but imperfect

gaps.issue: No validation that extracted thumb count matches DTLI reported count
gaps.notes: extractDTLIReviews logs summary but doesn't verify per-review thumbs

gaps.issue: BWW Roundups do NOT have thumb data - need to extract sentiment indicators
gaps.notes: BWW uses Rave/Positive/Mixed/Negative categories, not thumbs

gaps.issue: bwwThumb field exists but rarely populated from actual BWW data
gaps.notes: Overall stats show 674 bwwThumb but these may be derived, not extracted

gaps.issue: extractBWWRoundupReviews only handles limited critic patterns
gaps.notes: Hardcoded critic patterns miss many reviews

gaps.issue: URL extraction from BWW roundups often fails
gaps.notes: Many BWW-sourced reviews have url: null

gaps.issue: Dedup sometimes creates separate files for same review from different sources
gaps.notes: e.g., theatermania--jesse-green.json and theatermania--adam-feldman.json may both exist for same show

gaps.issue: mergeReviews doesn't always preserve best excerpt from each source
gaps.notes: showScoreExcerpt, dtliExcerpt, bwwExcerpt should all be retained

gaps.issue: Wrong production detection is MANUAL - no automated verification
gaps.notes: wrongProduction flag exists (59 flagged) but requires manual review to set

gaps.issue: No automated West End/touring/revival detection
gaps.notes: Show Score redirect detection exists but limited

gaps.issue: Verification happens AFTER review collection, not during
gaps.notes: Ideal flow verifies BEFORE adding to database

gaps.issue: No systematic audit of all reviews for wrong production
gaps.notes: audit script exists but not automated in pipeline

scripts: scripts/collect-review-texts.js (4-tier fallback: Playwright, ScrapingBee, BrightData, Archive.org)

gaps.issue: Full text coverage is only 48.9% (target: 90%+)
gaps.notes: 1010/2067 reviews have fullText >500 chars

gaps.issue: Original scores captured for only 5.9% of reviews
gaps.notes: 121/2067 reviews have originalScore field populated

gaps.issue: Designation capture is inconsistent
gaps.notes: Critics_Pick, Must_See not systematically extracted from review pages

gaps.issue: Paywall sites still challenging despite login support
gaps.notes: NYT, Vulture, WSJ logins in place but success rate varies

gaps.issue: Archive.org fallback is most successful but slowest
gaps.notes: Many successful fetches are tier 4 (archive)

gaps.issue: Truncation detection exists but not comprehensive
gaps.notes: textQuality field: 508 full, 120 partial, 79 truncated - many unlabeled

gaps.issue: No automated verification that scraped text is the RIGHT review
gaps.notes: Could scrape wrong article on same site, no content matching

gaps.issue: Score conversion validation is manual via audit script
gaps.notes: audit-scores.js exists but not automated in pipeline

gaps.issue: Paywall detection sometimes gives false positives/negatives
gaps.notes: isPaywalled() heuristic may miss new paywall patterns

gaps.issue: No cross-verification of scraped text against excerpt
gaps.notes: Could verify fullText contains dtliExcerpt/showScoreExcerpt

gaps.issue: LLM scoring runs on incomplete data (before full text achieved)
gaps.notes: 1923/2067 (93%) have llmScore, but many scored on excerpts not full text

gaps.issue: needsReview flag not systematically actioned
gaps.notes: ensembleData.needsReview identifies disagreements but no automated follow-up

gaps.issue: Low confidence scores still included in final scoring
gaps.notes: confidence: low scores filtered in rebuild but still calculated

gaps.issue: Audience buzz weighting may not reflect sample sizes well
gaps.notes: Dynamic weighting implemented but untested at scale

dtliThumbCoverage.gap: CRITICAL: Most DTLI thumbs not extracted

originalScoreCoverage.gap: CRITICAL: Star ratings, letter grades not captured

llmScoreCoverage.status: OK but scored before full text

sampleReviewAnalysis.notes: Good example - full text and thumb captured
Missing DTLI thumb - should have been captured
Good example - has original score captured

sprint1Results.summary: Critical Data Quality Fixes completed - thumb coverage improved from 37% to 60%
fixes: Fixed DTLI extraction to handle both aria-label and div.review_image outlet formats
Fixed DTLI extraction to handle nested div.entry-content for excerpts
Ran BWW roundup extraction on all 73 archived pages
230 new review files created from BWW roundups
85 existing reviews updated with BWW data
226 URLs added to existing review files

sprint2Results.summary: Original Score Capture - score coverage improved from 4.1% to 9.1%, designations from 3.7% to 8.2%
newFiles: scripts/backfill-original-scores.js - Backfill scores from archives and fullText
modifiedFiles: scripts/collect-review-texts.js - Integrated score extraction during text collection

prioritizedGaps.gap: DTLI thumb extraction failing for most reviews
prioritizedGaps.impact: Thumbs are a reliable sentiment signal, missing ~92% of them
prioritizedGaps.recommendation: Rewrite extractDTLIReviews with better HTML parsing, add validation
prioritizedGaps.result: DTLI extraction now captures 119.8% of DTLI-reported reviews. Coverage is 40%.

prioritizedGaps.gap: Full text coverage at 49% vs 90% target
prioritizedGaps.impact: LLM scoring on excerpts is less accurate than full text
prioritizedGaps.recommendation: Prioritize Archive.org as primary source, enhance paywall handling

prioritizedGaps.gap: Original scores captured for only 6% of reviews
prioritizedGaps.impact: Missing authoritative 4/5 stars, A+, etc. that should override LLM
prioritizedGaps.recommendation: Add score extraction patterns for each outlet's format
prioritizedGaps.result: Created score-extractors.js module with outlet-specific patterns. Coverage improved from 4.1% to 9.1%. Future text collection will auto-extract scores.

prioritizedGaps.impact: Off-Broadway, touring, West End reviews pollute Broadway scores
prioritizedGaps.recommendation: Add URL/content verification step before review is saved

prioritizedGaps.gap: BWW sentiment categories not extracted as thumbs
prioritizedGaps.recommendation: Map BWW categories to bwwThumb field during extraction
prioritizedGaps.result: BWW thumbs extracted from like/midlike/dislike-button-icon images. Coverage is 38%.

prioritizedGaps.gap: Show Score carousel doesn't capture all reviews
prioritizedGaps.recommendation: Improve Playwright carousel scrolling or use API if available

prioritizedGaps.gap: LLM scoring happens before data is complete
prioritizedGaps.impact: Scores based on excerpts may differ from full-text scores
prioritizedGaps.recommendation: Restructure pipeline: collect all data first, then score

prioritizedGaps.gap: No content verification that scraped text matches expected review
prioritizedGaps.recommendation: Add fuzzy match between fullText and excerpts

prioritizedGaps.impact: Missing +3 score bumps for notable designations
prioritizedGaps.recommendation: Add designation extraction patterns per outlet

prioritizedGaps.gap: Review refresh workflow doesn't trigger rebuild
prioritizedGaps.impact: New reviews discovered but not incorporated until manual rebuild
prioritizedGaps.recommendation: Add rebuild-all-reviews.js call at end of review-refresh workflow

tasks.details: Rewrite extractDTLIReviews to capture ALL thumb data
tasks.acceptance: 100% of DTLI reviews have dtliThumb populated
All BWW reviews have bwwThumb populated

tasks.details: Re-extract from archived pages to populate missing thumbs
tasks.acceptance: 70%+ of all reviews have at least one thumb

tasks.details: Pattern matching for TimeOut (5 stars), EW (letter grades), NYSR (unicode stars), etc.
Modify collect-review-texts.js to extract scores while scraping
tasks.acceptance: originalScore populated when page has explicit rating

tasks.details: Created backfill-original-scores.js to extract from existing data

tasks.task: Archive.org as primary for paywalled sites
tasks.details: Try Archive.org FIRST for known paywalled domains
tasks.acceptance: Paywall sites: 80%+ full text via Archive.org

tasks.details: Run multiple shows in parallel to increase throughput
Ensure NYT, Vulture, Variety have full text first
Check URL patterns, page content for off-broadway/touring/WestEnd signals
Verify production before creating review file
tasks.acceptance: Wrong-production reviews never added, only logged
All flagged reviews reviewed and corrected

tasks.details: Ensure LLM scoring only runs AFTER text collection complete
tasks.acceptance: LLM scoring blocked if <80% full text

tasks.details: Verify fullText contains excerpt before accepting
reviews.json rebuilt automatically after text collection

overallAssessment.biggestRisk: Low data quality (thumbs, original scores) undermines scoring accuracy
overallAssessment.quickestWin: Fix DTLI thumb extraction - immediate 60%+ improvement in sentiment signals
overallAssessment.longestPole: Full text coverage - requires sustained effort across multiple outlets
overallAssessment.recommendedFocus: Sprint 1 (Data Quality) should be completed before expansion to new shows
overallAssessment.estimatedEffort: 4-6 weeks for Sprints 1-3, 8-10 weeks for all 5 sprints
